rooms.description: Open-plan entrance with reception and multipurpose living space; includes a small kitchenette for convenience.
Private bedroom and small bathroom for domestic staff, ensuring privacy and functional design.
Spacious two-car garage with integrated utility storage area.
Well-equipped fitness area designed for luxury residents with soundproofing and climate control.
Includes laundry room, storage, and additional service areas.

vastu_considerations.recommendation: Position main entrance slightly away from the north-east corner to invite positive energy.
Ensure clear line of sight from entrance to living area for enhanced flow and security.
Place gym on eastern side to align with Vastu's activity and health energy focus.

building_norms.description: Adheres to local building codes for fire safety including proper ventilation, emergency exits, and sprinkler system installation.
Incorporates sustainable design principles with natural lighting and energy efficiency measures.
